response.overview: "MisfitSized Track 2" it's the sequel of the "Jem and The Holograms fan film from 2018, "MisfitSized". Misfitsized Track 2 is set some time after the first part, with the band Jem and the Holograms at the peak of their musical career. Meanwhile the rival band, The Misfits, saw their attempt at rising above them get thwarted and they were abandoned by their manager Erica Raymond. This time Raymond, full of anger, comes back to her former clients with an ace up her sleeve to launch a new attack against Jem and try to get back to the spotlight. However, se can't do it on her own: she'll need to find allies in The Stingers, a famous rock band whose vain leader Riot, is obsessed with Jem.
response.title: MisfitSized Track II
